title: Internal compiler error: requires `sync` lang_item

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I just got a, reported, compiler error using nightly 0.13 on code that was building on 0.12. I'm not sure if `requires 'sync' lang_item` is a bug in the compiler, or if it's a new error in my code that the compiler faults on.

Output of `rustc --version=verbose`:

``` bash
rustc 0.13.0-nightly (45cbdec41 2014-11-07 00:02:18 +0000)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 45cbdec4174778bf915f17561ef971c068a7fcbc
commit-date: 2014-11-07 00:02:18 +0000
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 0.13.0-nightly
```

Stack trace (from `RUST_BACKTRACE`):

``` bash
$ rustc -g -A non_camel_case_types -A dead_code --emit ir -o main.ll main.rs
error: requires `sync` lang_item
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.                                                          [12/1995]
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: ErrorReported', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/sl
ave/nightly-linux/build/src/libcore/result.rs:787

stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f637c518820 - rt::backtrace::imp::write::h8a05a2225574bd5ascq
   2:     0x7f637c51b8a0 - failure::on_fail::h3903c5b5788bc95c3xq
   3:     0x7f6380a64a00 - unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h0919efe752d6fd357Rd

   7:     0x7f6381309d40 - middle::check_static::CheckStaticVisitor<'a, 'tcx>.Visitor<'v>::visit_item::h03f2bd95aaa62bc4F6o
   8:     0x7f6381309140 - visit::Visitor::visit_mod::h362083169324649095
   9:     0x7f6381307b80 - middle::check_static::check_crate::h29fac653ca3741aeg1o
  10:     0x7f63810c5bc0 - util::common::time::h6545073167695776246
  11:     0x7f6381926940 - driver::driver::phase_3_run_analysis_passes::h46245b66b26614aeJoC
  12:     0x7f63819217a0 - driver::driver::compile_input::he3b1257e173b8860u5B
  13:     0x7f63819a4900 - driver::run_compiler::hd836d04808dd8d5eLVF
  14:     0x7f63819a47f0 - driver::run::closure.146540
  15:     0x7f63810deb00 - task::TaskBuilder<S>::try_future::closure.104852
  16:     0x7f63810de8f0 - task::TaskBuilder<S>::spawn_internal::closure.104823
  17:     0x7f6380dab630 - task::NativeSpawner.Spawner::spawn::closure.8456
  18:     0x7f6380ab98c0 - rust_try_inner
  19:     0x7f6380ab98b0 - rust_try
  20:     0x7f6380a62380 - unwind::try::h32143614f9ac9c88PGd
  21:     0x7f6380a62210 - task::Task::run::h8c90cb04437a131dFMc
  22:     0x7f6380dab370 - task::NativeSpawner.Spawner::spawn::closure.8394
```
